org.drombler.commons.action

Interface ToggleActionListener<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the action event
    All Superinterfaces:
    ActionListener<E>, org.softsmithy.lib.beans.Bean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActiveContextSensitiveToggleActionListener, AbstractApplicationContextSensitiveToggleActionListener, AbstractToggleActionListener

    public interface ToggleActionListener<E>
extends ActionListener<E>
    A GUI toolkit agnostic interface which keeps the state (enabled/ disabled, selected/ unselected etc.) and the logic between toggable menu items and toggable toolbar buttons in sync.
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSelected()
      Returns true, if this toggable action is selected, else false.
      void onSelectionChanged(boolean oldValue, boolean newValue)
      This method gets called when the selection state of this toggable action changes.
      void setSelected(boolean selected)
      Sets the selection state of this toggable action.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.drombler.commons.action.ActionListener

        isEnabled, onAction

      • Methods inherited from interface org.softsmithy.lib.beans.Bean

        addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()
        Returns true, if this toggable action is selected, else false.
        Returns:
        true, if this toggable action is selected, else false

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Sets the selection state of this toggable action.
        Parameters:
        selected - true, to select this toggable action, else false

      • onSelectionChanged

        void onSelectionChanged(boolean oldValue,
                        boolean newValue)
        This method gets called when the selection state of this toggable action changes.
        Parameters:
        oldValue - the old selection state
        newValue - the new selection state
